comment: This is the type of teacher that is a test heavy grader with all of their assignments counting for a little to nothing. If you even show a hint of academic dishonesty on the lockdown browser test, you will receive a zero with no opportunity of reparation. This leaves no room for error and a lot of room for failing.

This class is an easy A if you do all the work. Four discussions, about 10 quizzes only worth 1 pt each, two exams (lockdown and webcam), and a final project. The exams are mostly common sense and very easy. I did not study for exams and got high scores. He is also an easy grader so it is very hard not to do well in this class. Would take him again
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment: Professor Watkins is a new instructor at KSU. I was so glad to have him for class. He was engaging, cared about his students success and had reasonable expectations. 10/10
